titleStmt.title: The drumme of deuotion striking out an allarum to prayer, by signes in heauen, and prodigies on earth. Together with the perfume of prayer. In tvvo sermons, preached by William Leigh, Bachilor in Diuinitie, and pastor of Standish in Lancashire.
titleStmt.author: Leigh, William, 1550-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho: Creede, for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the white Horse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the white Horse
